short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search any text on Amazon via. right click menu or chrome omnibox or extension icon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you search products on Amazon in following 3 ways:
1. It helps you search any highlighted text by invoking right-click context menu.
2. clicking on extension icon inokes specialized Google custom search, which searches your local Amazon website for search term entered.
3. you may type 'amz+tab key', this activates Google's custom amazon search bar in place of chrome omnibox temporarily. Now enter desired product search term and you favorite amazon product search list will be loaded with thumbnails.

Choose your marketplace in the settings, highlight your desired text on any website, right click & search on Amazon.

2) Click on "Options' from menu.
3) Select your Country/Amazon domain.
